dialogue.text: Alright, everybody! Now that Ayane has returned without Uta and Io, it means it’s safe to assume that they drowned and that it’s okay to start Secret Santa without them!
They didn’t {i}drown.{/i} I found them and they’ll be here soon. I’m pretty sure Uta just needs a minute to collect herself for...reasons beyond my comprehension at the current moment.
Okay! Nevermind! Guess we can all sit here and fuck ourselves while we wait! In a nonliteral way, of course, so Kirin and Nodoka don’t combine brains and have a collective aneurysm!
Just implanting the thought in my head is enough to get me through the night.
Sure, Kirin. As if it wasn’t already there.
Hey! Here’s a fun idea! How about, instead of oversharing the things that turn us on, we share our favorite Christmas memories! Starting with Ami!
Sure! I think my favorite Christmas memory is from when I was still a little girl and-
Oh, look! Dorm 7 is back! Which means that we can all stop listening to Ami’s story and start giving each other shit! And I won’t even have to worry about being snubbed this year!
Feeling any better, Uta?
This dream sure is carrying on for a long time.
Merry Christmas, Yasu. I bestow unto you another MacCormack creation — your very own staff to complete your favorite costume in the club room.
The quality isn’t as good as mine, but I still managed to channel enough of my energy into it to allow the orb to float. Just don’t poke it or it may explode and kill you.
Am I really allowed to have this?
Of course! Tis’ the season, after all.
I mean religiously. Magic goes against the tenets of my beliefs and even holding such an object puts me at risk of disintegration.
Tsk tsk tsk. There is no {i}real{/i} magic imbued in this staff, Yasu. The {i}real{/i} magic is the friends we made along the way.
That sounds even more dangerous...
And it very well may be. But if you continue following in my footsteps, I can guarantee you that you’ll never have enough friends to make it a problem.
Merry holiday, Touka. May your days be joyous and filled with your preferred consistency of egg yolk.
Thank you, Tsuneyo. Merry egg yolk to you as well and best wishes to you and your father.
You appear troubled. Would you like to share some of the best Christmas present I have ever received? Out of the three Christmas presents I have ever received.
No thank you. I have trouble eating when I’m nervous and I worry that I’m about to once again ruin Christmas.
If you are going to murder someone, I believe Io would be the best choice. She contributes nothing to the class and would only be missed by one person.
But no matter who you decide to kill, please spare my son. I am willing to die in his place. But only if you can defeat me in hand to hand combat.
I have no intention of killing anyone. I just have a proven track record of giving gifts that are considered {i}over-excessive{/i} by my classmates.
And yes, that record may be comprised of just one thing, but that does nothing to dispel my worries and Sensei is {i}already{/i} difficult to shop for when his interests are limited to just...women.
Sir appears to like the shirt I made for him. He’s been regularly wearing it for a whole year now.
I’m sure that whatever you got for our teacher will be great, Touka. You’re so kind and smart and good and have so much money to spend on material goods.
What’d you get him anyway? I don’t remember you bringing anything with you on the bus ride over. Well, apart from your seemingly infinite inventory of cosmetic equipment.
You can never have too many breast-accentuating tops. Isn’t that right, noodle-refuser?
You could always give the Herald a wardrobe malfunction for Christmas. I’m sure that would go over well.
Perhaps {i}too{/i} well...
Unfortunately, I agreed earlier to not reveal the true nature of my gift to anyone else, so...
I’ll just have to wait and see what {i}his{/i} reaction to it will be...
Umm...yes, Ami?
Oh, don’t mind me. I’m just waiting for my present.
And...what makes you think I’m the one who has it?
I saw my name on the slip of paper you drew from the hat.
Right, right...
And on the off chance I left your present at home?
You what?! How?! You’re normally so prepared for this kinda thing! Do I really mean so little to you that you couldn’t even remember me on this super special, super important day?!
I’ll make it up to you okay?! This whole trip kind of, like...came out of nowhere for me. So...
We went shopping together for the trip like four days ago! Stop making excuses and tell me what my present is!
On the bright side, you’re not the only person without a present. Seems like a few people forgot to bring things this year. Myself included.
In fact, {i}none{/i} of us have gotten presents yet.
Hi. Melon delivery. Where do you want it?
Anywhere is fine since Karin didn’t come this year. And thank you very much for such a thoughtful gift, Makoto.
Oooh, she got me one of the cube ones. Well done.
What were you saying about none of us getting presents, Maya?
Just that Ayane’s not the only person who forgot to bring hers and that I, too, am a horrible friend.
Unless I was assigned someone I’m not friends with. In that case, I’d just be a bad person.
How do you not even remember who you got? You had two whole months to plan this.
I’ll find out sooner or later. Just keep an eye out for anyone else walking around empty handed.
Like Sensei over there- who looks like he’s about to be ritualistically whisked away by yet another troubled partygoer.
He forgot to get somebody a present too, didn’t he?
Looks that way.
Why am I the only one in this dysfunctional family who cares about Christmas this year?
Hey! How busy are you on a scale of one to ten?
Like a four. It feels like I’ve barely even been the protagonist for the last couple days.
Great! That means you can come with me to see the super awesome present I got you!
Also, do you know where Rin is? I haven’t seen her since Niki’s concert ended.
She wasn’t feeling well and is laying down in my room for now. She’ll probably come back once she remembers there is life outside of Otoha.
I am lowkey fed up with Otoha. She has no idea what she’s missing.
Says a girl who willingly missed out on the same exact thing.
The heart wants what the heart wants. And sometimes the heart wants a six foot tall adult male with a big dick. You got a problem?
Not really. If anything, I’m more curious about what’s going on behind you right now.
Is that code for something? Because I’m down if you are.
It wasn’t.
Well, it should be. Niki always gets my heart pounding and I’d let you do pretty much anything you want to me right now.
Wait, no. Shit. Not right now. I completely lost myself for a second and forgot I needed you to follow me.
Can that wait a second? Because I kind of want to hear more about your fantasies involving a certain pink-haired-
Maybe another time. We’ve got more important stuff to do right now.
So...what exactly did you get for me that has an apparently strict time limit and {i}isn’t{/i} sex?
Only the greatest present in the whole wide world.
Got it. So it {i}is{/i} sex.
That would certainly be an interesting turn of events. But no, it’s not that.
In fact, it’s not really as much of a present as it is a surprise.
My {i}real{/i} present is still on the way. It just needs a little more...preparation first.
I don’t think non-present surprises are a valid Secret Santa gift.
I didn’t have you for Secret Santa this year.
You didn’t?
No. This is just a thing I’m getting you involved with because of how much I love you. Which is a lot. And it’s okay if I say that since nobody else can hear us right now.
Correct. But this also means that there is another present waiting for me back in that room and you are keeping me from it.
Get it later. This is more important.
What can be more important than a mystery gift from a mystery person? That’s two whole layers of mystery.
That.
Kay! My job is done here. Play nice, you two. I have to go give Miku a box of old accessories and convince her to go fulltime gyaru with me.
Thanks, Chika.
Mhm! Love ya! Byeeee!
I’m not sure if I understand what’s going on right now...
Make that two of us.
Did you...ask for Chika to bring me to you? Because I’ve been looking all over-
Why? So you could shout out a bunch of shit about jerking off to me again?
You gonna be able to keep that to yourself this time? Or should I just walk away now?
I can try, yeah.
Good. Because I still ain’t said all I need to say to you and I’m tryin’ not to let petty shit like what people think about me drag me down anymore. You included.
I-
And I don’t want a fuckin’ apology either. Wouldn’t mean shit coming from you anyway.
Luckily for you, I wasn’t about to apologize. Because, like you said, it would mean nothing coming from me.

We gonna stand here like fuckin’ lunatics or are we gonna sit down? Can’t imagine this shit will be over quick. And if I don’t give my legs a break, I might not be able to book it again when you get all fuckin’ weird.
Yumi takes a seat at the edge of the pier.
I watch as the moon-touched water ripples in the breeze, far warmer than it should ever be this time of year.
And then I set my sights on the face of a girl watching the same exact thing.
A girl that, for the first time in what I can safely call {i}years{/i} at this point, found {i}me{/i} instead of me finding her.
Not counting of course our final moments at the Dorm Wars, which may or may not have even happened at this point.

In fact, it’s hard to recall {i}anything{/i} that’s happened at this point when my relationship with Yumi is arguably one of the most convoluted ones I have...and it’s all for reasons I don’t understand.
She’s never made it to the rooftop. She’s never even entered my house.
And her feelings, though blurred by my serpent tongue and its tendency to graze the skin of my unsuspecting prey, are all skin deep.
I’m certain I could taste them if I sunk my fangs into her again.
If I coiled around her body...waited patiently for her to stop moving...
{b}DEVOURED HER WHOLE{/b}
But I will not.
Because her flesh looks better in the moonlight.
And I long for the added effect of how my bedroom window will make it glow someday.
Maybe far off in the future.
Or maybe tonight if I have never understood her at all.
What do you think about me?
What do you mean?
Just...me as a whole.
What kind of person am I? How do you feel when you’re with me?
Do you ever find yourself getting mad? Confused? And how does that compare to the way you feel about everyone else?
I don’t...really get why you’re asking.
Because I want to fucking know and I just don’t get it.
You’re a confusing dude. And you do tons of shit that makes me want to rip your guts out and stomp on ‘em...but you’ve also helped me a lot. And I can’t ignore that shit anymore.
Not if it’s gonna make me feel like this.
Like {i}what,{/i} Yumi?

Like...calling you out here in the middle of the night just so I can talk to you. That ain’t shit I {i}want{/i} to do...but it’s shit I feel like I {i}have{/i} to do and I don’t get why I suddenly feel like that.
I did a lot of thinking in my time away from school...mostly about how I wished I would’ve fucked Nodoka up even harder, but I thought a lot about {i}you{/i} too.
But before you go freakin’ out again about how horrible of a douche we all know you are, there were some actual, like...{i}good{/i} thoughts in there.
Maybe it’s just cause I’m so used to all of the adults in my life being fuckin’ worthless criminals...but you ain’t been all that bad by comparison.
Done more for me than my mom or dad ever did, that’s for sure.
That said, though...you’re still fucking scum. And the chances of you ever bein’ able to redeem yourself for all of the horrible shit you’ve done don’t even exist as far as I’m concerned.
It ain’t just me you’re lettin’ down by bein’ so caught up in yourself that you can’t see everybody else, it’s...well, {i}everybody else{/i} that’s bein’ let down. You get it?
I do...but I don’t think you would have had Chika bring me here if that’s all you wanted to say.
So what else is there? Do you want to make up? Or is this your way of telling me to leave you alone for the rest of forever- a thing we both know I wouldn’t be able to do?

I don’t fuckin’ know, man. I’ve been thinkin’ nonstop about all of the shit I was gonna say over the last 24 hours, and now that you’re here, all I wanna do is call you a jack-off and tell you to eat shit.
Why’d you have to go and say all that stuff about yourself, man? Are you {i}trying{/i} to confuse me? Because it fuckin’ worked if that’s what you were going for.
I just want to be honest with you. And that’s a pretty big deal since I can’t even be honest with myself most of the time.
Honesty fucking hurts. Why couldn’t you just keep lyin’ to me and save me from actually havin’ to use my shitty ass brain? None of this makes sense.
Whether it be your relationship with Chika...
Or how you waited until I was at my most vulnerable to straight up give up on me...
I know I freaked out when you walked in, but...
But there was a serious moment before Nodoka showed up where I felt like I’d actually been {i}saved...{/i}
But then...
You didn’t do shit.
You just watched it all happen.
Do you {i}want{/i} me to hurt? Are you punishing me for something?
Why does that make you h-
{b}WHY THE FUCK DO YOU THINK?!{/b}
{b}USE YOUR STUPID, FUCKING ADULT BRAIN TO PUT YOURSELF INTO THE SHOES OF A CONFUSED TEENAGE GIRL TAKING THE WORLD ON ALL BY HERSELF!{/b}
{b}IMAGINE WHAT IT WOULD BE LIKE FINALLY BEING HELPED BY SOMEONE AFTER YEARS AND YEARS OF DOING EVERYTHING ALONE!{/b}
{b}IMAGINE HOW YOU WOULD FEEL ABOUT THAT PERSON!{/b}
{b}THEN IMAGINE WHAT IT WOULD BE LIKE TO HAVE IT ALL TAKEN AWAY! {/b}
{b}I FUCKING HATE YOU! BUT I DON’T! OKAY?! I DON’T!{/b}
Or at least I {i}didn’t.{/i}
I don’t know anymore.
But at the end of the day, I’m just another stupid fucking girl who can’t figure shit out on her own.
And that’s the exact reason you ever wanted to spend time with me in the first place.
Does it make you feel strong, Sensei? Having so much power and never actually using it for anyone but yourself?
How do you sleep at night?
Feel better now?
A little.
Good. Guess I’ll just pick up where we left off a couple months ago then.
What?
I’m exactly the type of person you said I am.
You were vulnerable, so I swooped in...and did things to make you trust me because I thought it would increase the chances of me getting into your pants one day.
You’re fucking-
But that was just the beginning.
Somewhere down the line, I actually {i}did{/i} start wanting to help you.
I don’t know if I just felt indebted because of the horrible experience I put you through in the second half of town so long ago...but I really did want to help.
And I {i}still{/i} want to help.
But those other feelings? The ones that I know are wrong- that you {i}despise{/i} me for having.
I can’t make them go away.
If it was that easy, I’d do it.
But to me, you...and everyone else...will always find your way into my fan-
Don’t tell me about your fucking fantasies! They only make shit more confusing!
I tried to get it all off my chest two months ago, but-
And what the fuck are you talking about with all this “Two months ago” crap?! You said all of that shit to me {i}yesterday!{/i} Stop trying to confuse me every chance you get!
But if that’s what we talked about yesterday, what did we talk about at the end of the Dorm Wars?
The fuck are you on, dude? We-
We...
That’s...
That’s...weird...
I can’t really remember...
I remember...coming to the closing ceremony thing to talk to you about...
About...the same thing I’m talking about today? But why...would...
What the fuck?...
What the {i}fuck?{/i}
Do you remember...{i}anything{/i} from the last two months, Yumi?
Yeah, obviously! It wasn’t much different from how shit normally is. I woke up...went to sc-
Wait, no. I was suspended from school, wasn’t I? How’d I get back in? {i}When{/i} did I get back in? And why don’t I...
What...the fuck is going on right now? Why can’t I remember anything?
Maybe you just...{i}skipped{/i} the last couple months?
{i}Skipped{/i} them? Are you fucking crazy?
I know how it sounds. And there are probably rules against me telling you this, but that’s exactly how it happened for me.
I started talking to you at the end of the Dorm Wars...blinked...and suddenly we were all here.
This really isn’t the time to fuck with me, dick.
I’m not.
Yeah, whatever...just...
Seriously, what the {i}fuck?{/i}
My phone goes off while Yumi is busy staring into space (For reasons I completely understand) and I seize the opportunity to take a look at who it is.
{i}Merry Christmas! I asked Chika where you were since I saw you guys leave together and she told me you were busy, but I wanted to remind you about our plans tonight.{/i}
{i}You don’t HAVE to come if it’s something super serious and whatnot, but I’ll be in this little clearing thing I found near where the forest meets the dunes.{/i}
{i}You can get there from a trail about half a mile west of the inn, but it’s kind of hard to see when it’s dark, so I drew a big heart in the sand. Turn there and follow that until you find me. {/i}
{i}I started a bonfire for the two of us (Or just me if you can’t come) so that might help you find me as well.{/i}
{i}Anyway, that’s all! Just checking in and letting you know I’m here whenever you want to (Or don’t want to) come.{/i}
{i}See you soon. Maybe <3{/i}
Yumi, I-
Yeah, go.
I need to, like...gather my thoughts and shit.
But we ain’t done. We’ll pick this shit up once I can actually think again.
Well, best of luck. And let me know if you figure anything out because it would sure as hell be a huge help.
You’re in luck, Noriko.
You won’t have to spend another night alone.
{i}Yumi’s affection has increased to [yumi_love]!{/i}
